definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]

sentences.english: In 1974 , Niue becomes independent from New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 1974年的今天，紐埃島脫離新西蘭獨立。

sentences.english: 1974 - Niue becomes independent from New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 1974年的今天，紐埃島脫離新西蘭獨立。

sentences.english: Niue belonging to the Polynesian Islands, New Zealand and maintain the Compact of Free Association.
sentences.chinese: 紐埃屬於波利尼西亞羣島，與新西蘭保持自由聯繫。

sentences.english: Gravestone of Fataaki, king of Nieue, outside Ekalesia Church.
sentences.chinese: 新教教堂外的紐埃國王法塔基的墓碑。

sentences.english: Miller was out, Manuel and Buck left the garden together.
sentences.chinese: 曼紐埃爾與巴克一道兒離開了花園。
